text: Josephine Ann Tewson (26 February 1931 â€“ 18 August 2022) was an English actress. She was best known for her roles in the British sitcoms Keeping Up Appearances and Last of the Summer Wine. Her career began in 1957 and she retired in 2019. Tewson died on 18 August 2022 at a retirement home in London, England at the age of 91. ==References== == Other websites == * Josephine Tewson on IMDb Category:1931 births Category:2022 deaths Category:English movie actors Category:English stage actors Category:English television actors Category:Actors from London
